de.fha.dpmi.versioning

Class VersionGraphDVCSGit

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fha.dpmi.versioning.VersionGraphDVCSBase
      • de.fha.dpmi.versioning.VersionGraphDVCSGit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DpmiTooling, VersionGraphDVCS

    public class VersionGraphDVCSGit
extends VersionGraphDVCSBase
    Implements a version graph using the Git DVCS

                           java.lang.String... filePattern)

        Merges the given version with a shared branch as a merge base. Outstanding changes are committed beforehand.
        Parameters:
        version - version to merge
        sharedBranchMergeBase - merge with this branch
        filePattern - patterns for committing outstanding changes before merge

        latest version
